title: Fix 'Book Your Detail Now' hero button scroll to booking form

requirements.text: In Hero.tsx, update the 'Book Your Detail Now' CTA button so that clicking it smoothly scrolls the page down to the booking/contact form section. The button's onClick handler must use document.getElementById('contact') (or 'booking', whichever id is present on the ContactBooking section wrapper) and call scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }) to animate the scroll. Verify the target section element has the matching id attribute.

quotes: make sure when someone preses book your detail now on top it takes them down to book your detail on the bottom

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking 'Book Your Detail Now' in the Hero section smoothly scrolls the page to the booking form section at the bottom.
The scroll animation is smooth (behavior: 'smooth'), not an instant jump.
The ContactBooking section wrapper element has an id of 'contact' or 'booking' that the scroll target references.
The button works correctly on both desktop and mobile viewports.

constraints: Do not alter the visual appearance or layout of the Hero section or the booking form section.
Do not modify any immutable frontend paths.
nonGoals: Fixing the backend canister stopped/IC0508 error.
Changing the booking form fields or validation logic.
Modifying any other CTA buttons or navigation links.
